message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $150?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $165.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still hoping to find a way to purchase this product for $150 if possible. Could we possibly reach an agreement at this price?
I understand you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit lower than my previous offer, so I can offer it to you for $162.50.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're getting closer. I'm still hoping to purchase the product for $150. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
